root.name: beatmania
root.description: SonglistDisc 1 -beatmania-[BREAK BTS] prophet-31 - 2 gorgeous 4U [HOUSE] dj nagureo - 20,november [HARD TEKNO] DJ FX - Acid Bomb [AMBIENT] QUADRA - Beginning of Life [DRUM'N BASS MIX] QUADRA - DEEP CLEAR EYES [BALLAD (JAZZ SOUL)] reo-nagumo - Do you love me? [RAVE] e.o.s. - e-motion [REGGAE] jam master '73 - jam jam reggae [REGGAE FUNKY MIX] Crunky BoyÂ - jam jam reggae (Funky Jam Cookie Mix) [SOUL] LOVEMINTS - LOVE SO GROOVY (12 inch version) [HOUSE SPIRITUAL MIX] NITE SYSTEM - LOVE SO GROOVY (Nite's After Luv mix) [MINIMAL TECHNO MIX] QUADRA - OVERDOSER (Driving Dub mix) [TECHNO] MIRAK - OVERDOSER (romo mix) [KONAMIX] NITE SYSTEM - Salamander Beat Crush mix [SKA] THE BALD HEADS - SKA a go go [JAPANESE HIP-HOP] performed by cokey DJ Mazinger - tokai [HIP-HOP] dj nagureo - u gotta groove [HIP-HOP STREET MIX] DJ Mazinger - u gotta groove (Triple Mazin Dub) Disc 2 -APPEND YEBISU MIX-[SPEED GARAGE] Tomoki Hirata - Ain't It Good [STYLE GARAGE] Tomoki Hirata - BODY [FUNK] UPA NORA - Cat Song ~Theme of UPA~ [ASIAN TRADITIONAL] CHEAP FOREST - Changing the ASIA [HARD HOUSE] Tomoki Hirata - I.C.B. [BOSSA GROOVE french version] staccato two-F - La Bossanova de Fabienne [BIGBEAT MIX] ESPACIO BROTHERS - METALGEAR SOLID ~Main Theme~ [BOSSA GROOVE] staccato two-J - PAPAYAPA BOSSA [FUNKY JAZZ GROOVE] Herbie Hammock His Band - Stop Violence!
